title: Erfaren AI-inriktad systemutvecklare
description:
Om företaget
  
Avaron AB är ett konsultbolag med fokus på att leverera högkvalitativa IT-lösningar och tjänster till kunder i olika branscher. Vi sätter stor vikt vid kompetensutveckling och erbjuder en stimulerande arbetsmiljö där våra medarbetare får möjlighet att växa professionellt och personligt. Vårt mål är att alltid ligga i framkant när det gäller ny teknik och innovativa lösningar.
  
Arbetsuppgifter
  
I detta konsultuppdrag kommer du att ingå i ett nystartat, tvärfunktionellt team hos en av våra kunder inom offentlig sektor. Teamet arbetar agilt med att utveckla och förvalta avancerade lösningar inom AI och maskininlärning, med fokus på analys och automatisering. Du kommer bland annat att:
  
Designa och implementera nya plattformar för avancerad dataanalys och AI-tillämpningar.
  
Utveckla, produktionssätta och underhålla maskininlärningsmodeller för att skapa effektiva och säkra lösningar.
  
Samarbeta nära både interna och externa intressenter för att integrera nya tekniska lösningar i befintlig infrastruktur.
  
Bidra med din expertis för att vidareutveckla riktlinjer, metoder och arbetssätt i teamet.
  
Säkerställa att arbetet sker i enlighet med relevanta säkerhetskrav och bestämmelser kring AI.
  
  

Kvalifikationer (Ska-krav)
  
Minst 3 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av att designa, utveckla och underhålla AI-inriktade analyslösningar och plattformar.
  
Minst 3 års dokumenterad erfarenhet av att utveckla, implementera och produktionssätta maskininlärningsmodeller.
  
Många års erfarenhet (normalt 9–12 år) av systemutveckling inom relevant område, vilket motsvarar en senior nivå.
  
Möjlighet att genomgå säkerhetsprövning (nivå 3) innan uppdragets start.
  
  

Meriterande (Bra att ha)
  
Erfarenhet av data engineering och hantering av stora datamängder.
  
Programmeringsvana i Python.
  
**Erfarenhet av att utveckla och integrera API:** er i olika system.
  
Kunskaper i Java för systemutveckling.
  
God förståelse för databaser och SQL.
  
Erfarenhet av förvaltningsarbete inom AI.
  
Vana vid säkerhetsfrågor kopplat till AI.
  
Erfarenhet av juridiska aspekter kring AI-lösningar.
  
  

Ansökan
  
Välkommen med din ansökan genom att mejla personligt brev och CV till:
  
jobb@avaron.se
  
Märk mejlet med ”Erfaren AI-inriktad systemutvecklare (I12662)” i ämnesraden.
  
Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: Seniora utvecklare till Visma Spcs
description:
#### ***Nu söker vår produktutvecklingsavdelning flera seniora utvecklare! Är du en av dem?***

*Hos oss får du vara med och skapa framtidens SaaS-system som gör företagande både enkelt och kul, ett uppdrag vi tar på stort allvar på Visma Spcs. Drivs du av samarbete, teknik i framkant och dessutom gillar att ha kul på jobbet - då ska du läsa vidare!*

* **Vad kan du förvänta dig?**

Du blir en del av ett engagerat gäng där alla bidrar till att hitta den bästa lösningen genom att säkerställa att våra produkter blir enkla att jobba med, förhåller sig till lagar och regler och utmanas att tänka nytt. Samarbete med andra utvecklare, UX-designers och Business Analysts är en del av vardagen och ger dig möjlighet att både utveckla fantastiska produkter och dina egna färdigheter. Naturligtvis är AI en del av vår vardag för att både vi och våra kunder ska jobba smartare.


 Vill du veta mer om hur det är att vara utvecklare hos Visma? Kika här: https://developer.visma.com/

#### **Vem är du?**

Vi söker dig som är en driven och erfaren utvecklare med ett genuint intresse för webbutveckling. Du älskar att experimentera och lära dig om de senaste verktygen, teknologierna och processerna. Du är proaktiv och ser till att lösningarna alltid är på topp.


Vi ser också att du har en god förståelse för hela web stacken, från server till webbläsare, samt en förståelse av att utveckla REST API:er. Nedan är några av de tekniker/ramverk vi jobbar med:

* C# .Net
* HTML, CSS
* React och Angular
* MS SQL
* Entity Framework
* Azure


Har du jobbat med utveckling av multitenanta webbapplikationer med många samtidiga användare och höga krav på tillgänglighet? Toppen, det är ett stort plus!

#### **Vad erbjuder vi?**

* Möjligheten att utvecklas tillsammans med entusiastiska kollegor i ett av Sveriges ledande SaaS-bolag, och som dessutom är en del av Europas största tech-koncern. Vi är stolta över att ha blivit utnämnda till Karriärföretag 2025!

  

* Regelbundna tech talks, hackathons och guilds där du kan dela med dig av och utveckla din kompetens
* En hybridkultur som erbjuder dig flexibilitet i din vardag, där du har möjligheten att jobba från något av våra härliga kontor och ibland på distans.


- "My Competence Day" - dedikerade dagar för din personliga och professionella utveckling.

* Hälsa och välmående ligger oss varmt om hjärtat. Och därför satsar vi på aktiviteter som får dig att må bra, både i knopp och kropp.

  

När vi frågar våra medarbetare varför de trivs hos oss brukar de flesta svara företagskulturen, engagemanget bland kollegorna i kombination med möjligheterna att utvecklas. Hos oss får du arbeta med omkring 500 kollegor på en arbetsplats med massvis av möjligheter!


Känns det spännande? Då vill vi gärna jobba med dig!

#### **Vi väntar på din ansökan!**


Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande så vänta inte att med att visa ditt intresse. Önskar du mer information om tjänsten är du varmt välkommen att kontakta Johan Greén, johan.green@visma.com  

Tester och bakgrundskontroller förekommer som en del av rekryteringsprocessen.

 **Om Visma Spcs**

*Vi lever i specialintressets tidsålder då företagande kan vara, ja, lite vad som helst. På gatan, i skogen, på internet, hos frisören, i drömmar och fantasier eller mitt framför näsan på en – passioner finns överallt. Men få tänker på att det faktiskt kan bli en affärsidé. Med molnbaserade ekonomisystem ger vi framtidens företagare allt de behöver inom bokföring, fakturering och löner. Vi gör detta för att vi är övertygade om att det får samhället och individer att växa och skapa ett företagsliv fullt av passion. Vi vill helt enkelt inspirera Sverige att hitta modet och ta det första steget – för att leva ut sina passioner genom företagande med oss.*


  
Department
Software Development
Roll
Software Developer
Platser
Växjö, Malmö
Distansarbete
Hybridarbete
Application deadline
16 mars 2025
Competencies
React, .NET, Angular, Azure, C#

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
**Välkommen till Benchmarking Alliance!**
-----------------------------------------


Benchmarking Alliance är ett SaaS-bolag grundat 2010 och vi är idag en stolt del av **Nordtech Group**. Vår SaaS-tjänst för Hospitality-sektorn ökar våra kunders intäkter genom benchmarking. Våra kunder är i huvudsak hotell och konferensanläggningar i framförallt Norden och Baltikum men även Spanien och Mexiko.


Vi är ett litet men dedikerat kärnteam och med denna nya roll blir vi sex personer - du, CTO, Business Development Manager, New Business Manager, Customer Succes Manager och CEO. Vi är en väletablerad verksamhet med stor kundbas och vårt kontor ligger mitt i Stockholm city på **Epicenter**.  

  

Läs gärna mer om oss på vår **hemsida**!

### **Om rollen**


Under det senaste året har vi gått från att använda frilansande konsulter till att själva driva vår produktutveckling. Vi har börjat bygga upp vår interna utvecklingskapacitet och satsar på att öka vår tillväxt. För att möjliggöra detta utökar vi tech-teamet så att vi kan samarbeta och utmana varandra, dela det strategiska och operativa helhetsansvaret för utveckling, drift och support samt säkerställa att nya projekt kan drivas parallellt som vi löser ad-hoc-uppgifter och felsökning av tekniska integrationer med våra kunder som kan uppstå.
  

  

Vi utvecklar, underhåller och moderniserar ett affärskritiskt system med stark Product Market Fit. Som Fullstack Developer hos oss får du en bred och varierad nyckelroll i teamet samt stor påverkan på teknikval och utvecklingsprocess.  

  

**Din vardag!**  

  

Hos oss är dagarna varierande och du kommer att arbeta både med kod och strategiska beslut vilket mer konkret innebär:

* **Aktiv utveckling av vår produkt** - Du har ett starkt intresse för teknik och ser fram emot att bidra stort i utvecklingen och driften av vår tjänst. Vår plattform har levererat affärsvärde under lång tid, och vi ser stora möjligheter att vidareutveckla och modernisera.
* **Teknik- och produktstrategi** - Vi är ett litet och flexibelt team med korta beslutsvägar och kan snabbt gå från idé till implementering. AI och datadrivna insikter är exempel på områden vi ser stor potential i framöver.
* **Bidrag till affären** - Du har förmågan att översätta kundbehov till tekniska lösningar och ser teknik och affär som två sidor av samma mynt.


Vår teknikstack inkluderar Python, Django, PostgreSQL, Docker, Ansible och AWS. Vi hanterar en befintlig kodbas i Python 2, vilket innebär både underhåll och en långsiktig ambition att modernisera systemet.  



### **Din bakgrund**


Du har sannolikt några års erfarenhet av systemutveckling, gärna från SaaS-bolag eller som konsult. Du trivs i en ansvarsfull roll som både är strategisk och operativ och kan utan problem sätta dig in i en kodbas baserad på Django och Python samt vidareutveckla den på egen hand. Du trivs med, och kan visa exempel på, hur du tidigare tagit stort eget ansvar samt motiveras av att driva utvecklingen framåt.  

  

Eftersom vi arbetar nära tillsammans i ett mindre team där svenska är arbetsspråk vill vi att du kan kommunicera obehindrat på svenska. Erfarenhet av AWS, Docker, Ansible och AI i Python är också meriterande.


### **Din personlighet**


Vi tror att du är en engagerad och analytisk person som hela tiden strävar framåt och som nu är redo att kliva in i ett nytt kapitel med oss.


Även om du, tillsammans med vår CTO (som också arbetar operativt med utvecklingen), är våra tekniska experter, trivs du med att arbeta tätt tillsammans med ett litet team med andra kompetenser. De allra flesta dagarna arbetar vi tillsammans på vårt kontor i centrala Stockholm, vilket gör att vi kan samarbeta effektivt och driva utvecklingen framåt. Därför tror vi att du är en smidig samarbetspartner samt har en stark kommunikativ förmåga.

### **Vi erbjuder**

* Det bästa av två världar: Upplev dynamiken, snabbheten och glädjen av en startup, men med stabiliteten som en etablerad kundbas och ägare ger.
* Påverkansmöjlighet: Detta är en nyckelroll - du kommer att ha stor inverkan på våra tekniska beslut och lösningar.
* Spännande inblick i besöksnäringens inre: Vi följer branschens utveckling på ett unikt sätt och skapar direkt affärsnytta för våra kunder.
* Härligt team och inkluderande kultur: Vi har en öppen och transparent företagskultur och du kommer att bli en del av ett engagerat team som värdesätter långsiktighet och kontinuitet i arbetet.
* Frihet: Hos oss får du stor frihet att forma din roll och bidra med din expertis.
* Marknadsmässig lön och förmåner

  

Vill du vara med på vår resa?  

Vi tillämpar löpande urval – skicka in din ansökan redan idag!  

  

I denna rekryteringsprocess använder vi psykometriska tester från **Alva Labs** för att säkerställa en rättvis och objektiv bedömning av alla kandidater.

title: Backend-utvecklare C#
description:
Är du en erfaren backend-utvecklare som är duktig på C# och som vill hjälpa oss på vår fortsatta utvecklingsresa? Skulle du gilla att jobba med flera produkter i ett litet agilt utvecklingsteam där du får ta eget ansvar och vara med och påverka både teknik och arbetssätt? I så fall är du kanske vår nya kollega!

### **Om rollen**


Vi söker en IT-utvecklare med fokus på backend till vårt utvecklingsteam på IT-avdelningen. Vi arbetar brett i våra roller och hjälps åt för att leverera i våra projekt. Vi erbjuder dig varierande arbetsuppgifter i ett litet team med stora möjligheter att själv påverka arbetet, ta ansvar och att prova egna idéer. Du kommer också få vara med i utvecklingen av DevOps-process och teknikstacken.  

  

IVL utvecklar bland annat digitala stöd och verktyg i syfte att spara resurser, uppmuntra till hållbarhet och minska miljöpåverkan. Det kan till exempel handla om att erbjuda webbtjänster och applikationer för att minska klimatpåverkan, uppmuntra till cirkulära affärsmodeller och för att minska vår totala påverkan på klimatet.
  

  

I den här rollen kommer du i huvudsak arbeta med backend-utveckling i digitala produkter och webbapplikationer för våra dotterbolag samt i uppdrags- och forskningsprojekt. Förutom nyutveckling så kommer du också förvalta och vidareutveckla befintliga applikationer samt uppdatera vår teknikstack. Du kommer arbeta brett inom hela IT-utvecklingsområdet med dina kollegor inom utvecklingsteamet. Arbetet sker hela tiden nära beställare, kunder, produktägare och projektledare och andra roller inom IT-avdelningen. Teamet består av fem utvecklare och IT-strateg som agerar teknisk projektledare och scrum master.


#### **Din bakgrund**


För att lyckas i rollen har du

* Relevant högskoleexamen inom datavetenskap, annan relevant utbildning inom systemutveckling eller arbetslivserfarenhet som vi anser vara likvärdig
* Minst fem års erfarenhet av självständigt arbete som backend-utvecklare i Microsoft C# .NET
* Erfarenhet av mjukvaruutvecklingsmetoder inom Agile och Scrum
* Erfarenhet av arbete i Azure DevOps eller liknande system
* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både tal och skrift


Det är meriterande om du också har erfarenhet av React eller Blazor.

#### **Vem är du?**


Vi söker en driven och passionerad backend-utvecklare som skulle trivas med att arbeta i ett litet utvecklingsteam där du får ta stort eget ansvar och vara med och bidra till helheten. Du är självgående, lösningsorienterad och har en förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i nya teknologier och arbetssätt. Du har en god samarbetsförmåga och trivs med att samverka med olika kompetenser både inom IT och i verksamheten. Du håller dig uppdaterad på de senaste teknikerna inom systemutveckling och är motiverad att utvecklas tillsammans med oss. Det är positivt om du har ett intresse av samhällsutveckling och hållbarhetsfrågor.

  

Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.


#### **Vad erbjuder vi?**


Vi arbetar i en kreativ och utvecklande miljö där alla har en stor del eget ansvar och goda möjligheter till personlig och professionell utveckling. Som medarbetare på IVL blir du del av en arbetsplats som värdesätter mångfald, samarbete, innovation och engagemang. Här finns en härlig gemenskap med såväl idrottsklubb, konstförening, fester, pubar och andra aktiviteter. Vi sitter i aktivitetsbaserade lokaler. Hos IVL får du möjlighet att arbeta med ditt hållbarhetsengagemang på riktigt!


#### **Välkommen med din ansökan**


Är du den utvecklare vi söker? Ansök med ditt CV genom att klicka på "Ansök här". Vi kommer att utvärdera ansökningar och intervjua kandidater löpande under ansökningsperioden så vänta inte med din ansökan.  

  

Till bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag och till dig som är försäljare: Vi undanber oss vänligen men bestämt direktkontakt med bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag samt försäljare av ytterligare jobbannonser.

title: Experienced Software Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**


Our team is leading the Global Network Management Customer Adaptation business and is set to define and foster services business and support Ericsson Market Area (MA) customer engagements & software deliveries above and beyond the standard Ericsson Product Software capabilities. The team drives service development, service industrialization and provides key competence in customer delivery engagements implemented together with our offshore teams on customer requests.

  

We are opening a position for an Experienced Software Developer to join and strengthen up the expertise on our customer built software services around the Ericsson Network Management suite. The primary task of the role would be crafting and delivering customer adaptations with a focus on new solutions and critical customer engagements on products including Ericsson Network Management products; Ericsson Network Manager (ENM) and Ericsson Intelligent Controller (EIC).

  

This would also include supporting the automation of our delivery processes and pipelines, CI/CD. And as such, you would be expected to support the definition and execution of agile processes for how we shall design, deliver, and maintain/support software as well as support in technical sales and effort estimations.

  

It is important for our team members to make a direct impact to how customers perceive our solutions and have a direct insight to the business outcome of our activities! You will be part of evolving our offerings in an area where we see a strong momentum for software driven service delivery business in the coming years. We work with a strong emphasis on transparency, inclusion, trust and team success and therefore we are looking for individuals who like to contribute to the team within such dynamics, where tasks can change dynamically for the greater good of our business.

  

Within the team, there will be great development possibilities in a diverse work environment within a multi skilled team that has a close connection to both the global market as well as the development organizations. As such, the role provides an entry point to the latest functionality and techniques Ericsson offers in Network Management.

  

You will cooperate and communicate, in an international environment, both with colleagues internally as well as customers and suppliers to Ericsson. You will, in most engagements, work remotely in virtual teams but there could be occasional cases of travel worldwide for internal or customer activities.

  

As one of our key developers, your involvement in end to end activities in most things we do, from Product reviews to customer deliveries and asset creation is key! It will require good analytical and technical skills, communication skills and a strong personal drive and demeanor to learn.

 **What you will do:**

* Support pre-sales activities, including identifying customer opportunities and needs as well as support performing pre-studies and commercial offerings to customers
* Craft solution designs and configurations in customer networks
* Drive implementation process and develop customer adaptations
* Support strategy and new service development activities
* Lead remote and on-site customer deliveries
* Support identify and drive product/solution and serviceability improvements and requirements towards Ericsson product units and services teams
**The skills you bring:**
-------------------------



1. Software solutioning and design experience (work package definition, solution design, testing, etc.) in some or several of the used languages, tools and protocols such as:

* Java SE/EE and Python, including multithreaded/process and distributed systems
* Experience of Web Design (JavaScript, NodeJS)
* Cloud native architecture, containers, K8s, Docker, Micro Services
* SNMP/REST/NetConf/CORBA/Kafka
* GitLab/GitRunner
* Security scanning e.g., Sonarcube
* Software artifact repository e.g., JFrog
* Linux


2. Knowledge and experience in automation, AI/ML, agile ways of working, software engineering principles and process transformation


3. Ability to drive work in a structured & proactive manner, with good communicate skills verbally and in writing, focusing on explaining technical solution to different stakeholders on their level


4. Collaborative, team-player with ability to work across domains, in teams, across geographies and cultures. Ability to build effective relationships and excellent social, communication and consultative skills


5. Innovative and problem-solving demeanor with a desire to drive continuous improvements technically keeping an open mind to seeing the opportunity in change and always challenge us to improve

**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.

  

The selection and the interview process is ongoing. Therefore, send your application in English as soon as possible. Kindly note we do not accept application sent via e-mail.

 **Location**: Göteborg, Sweden

 **What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Göteborg

**Req ID:** 762500

title: Full Stack Developer Digital Product Development Pricing...
description:
***Are you passionate about building and growing impactful products in a collaborative and innovative environment? Join our team as a full-stack developer, where you'll work on a strategic core product, leverage cutting-edge technologies like C#/.NET Core and cloud solutions, and be part of a talented team that values growth and innovation!***

**This is what makes the position as Full Stack Developer unique**

  

* Play a key role in shaping a strategic product that drives the company's success.
* Take ownership of an evolving product with opportunities for continuous development and innovation.
* Collaborate with a talented and supportive team that values growth and teamwork.


The hiring manager for this role is **Arnoud Rebel, Manager, Portals & Pricing**. As a leader, he is dedicated to enabling personal and professional growth, leading with empathy, and fostering an open and supportive environment where every team member can thrive.

***Read more about Dustin here***

**Your role & influence as** **Full Stack Developer**

***Responsibility*****:** In this role, you will be given responsibility for full-stack development within a collaborative, cross-functional team, focusing on enhancing and growing a strategic product while collaborating closely with fellow developers.  

  

***Collaboration*****:** Together with your team, you take care of building, maintaining, and developing a core product, collaborating closely not only with your immediate team members but also with the Digital Product Development department.  

  

***Core activities:***

* Develop and maintain the core product.


* Enhance and grow the product through continuous improvements.



**Benefits of joining Dustin**


We believe there's more to Dustin than just the benefits listed here. You'll fully understand this once you're with us.

  


**You can find more on our benefits below in the vacancy.**

**This is what we imagine you bring**


We envision you as a curious, open-minded, and driven problem-solver with a strong team focus and a commitment to continuous learning. You thrive on developing and enhancing products, leveraging your expertise developed through minimum 5 years of experience with C# and .NET Core, relational databases/SQL, and building REST APIs, while embracing cloud technologies like Azure or AWS to drive innovation.

*Additionally, it'll be nice to see that you have experience with:*

  

* Javascript/node.js
* React

**What can you expect next?**


To ensure a fair recruitment process free from unconscious bias, we handle your application anonymously and do not accept cover letters. Please refrain from sending one, so that the selection is based solely on professional competencies. We expect the following steps in the recruitment process:

* Telephone screening with Talent Acquisition Partner, Karishma
* First interview with Hiring Manager, Arnoud and another future colleague.
* Code Assignment and a Second (Technical) interview with two future colleagues.
* Professional references

**Read more about how to become a** **Dustineer**


For questions about the position, please contact the TA Partner Karishma Sindhu via e-mail: karishma.sindhu@dustin.com
company_description: We are a leading online-based IT partner in the Nordics and the Benelux. We are in constant movement and with that comes many opportunities for us to develop and grow together. Are you ready to join?

title: Next Generation: Software Developer
description:
**About this opportunity:**


We are delighted to announce an exciting opportunity to join Ericsson as a Developer.

  



We look for young talents and especially encourage female engineers to apply

  

Within this role, you will have the chance to develop and maintain an array of products and services. Your development journey in this role will range from requirement analysis, system design, architecture design, software design, integration, support to creating product documentation.

  



In our Cross functional teams, we develop solutions inside Ericsson to digitalize the decision making with the power of data. We make them Fly!

  

We are actively seeking the next wave of tech talent through our NextGen graduate initiative in Stockholm. This opportunity is for recent graduates with 0-3 years of experience who are eager to launch a meaningful career in technology. Although we have an exceptional team in place, we are always focused on building for the future. If you're ready to make an impact, this is your chance to join us.

 **What you will do:**

  



* Develop solutions to collect, handle and present big data volumes.
* Proactively share knowledge and collaborate with team members.
* Design solutions End to end, with user contacts, requirement analysis, test and delivery.
* Upskill and seek new knowledge in relevant areas
* Innovate, push ideas, try ideas, POC

  



**The skills you bring:**

  

* + - Java or similar
		- Big data, Data modeling and Databases SQL/NoSQL like PostgreSQL and Opensearch
		- Cloud native, e.g. Kubernetes
		- Micro services.
		- CI/CD, e.g. Argo CD

 **Bonus skills/knowledge**

  

* + - Capacity to learn Front end development.
		- Knowledge in Artificial Intelligence.

**Join our Team**
-----------------

title: Group Lead och Backend utvecklare
description:
- **Vill du arbeta tillsammans med inspirerande, glada och kompetenta kollegor i ett av Malmös mest innovativa och centrala nav kring mjukvaruutveckling? Söker du en roll där du kan kombinera din expertis som konsult med ledarskap och strategiskt ansvar och vara med och skapa innovativa digitala produkter?**

**Vilka är vi?**  

Vi är ett IT-konsultföretag som främjar en kultur där medarbetarna känner sig trygga, inspirerade och glada. Vi tror att detta är den bästa miljön där människor kan växa och bygga de bästa produkterna. Vi grundades år 2000, vi har en långsiktig syn på våra kunder och medarbetarrelationer och hoppas att du kommer att vilja stanna hos oss länge.


Visste du att vi faktiskt också grundade utvecklarkonferensen Øredev som fortfarande är en del av samma företag?

  
**Vem är du?**  

Vi söker en Group Lead till vår utvecklingsenhet i Malmö. Denna roll är perfekt om du vill kombinera konsultrollen med ledarskaps- och ledningsansvar.
  

  

Som Group Lead kommer du i första hand arbeta med konsultuppdrag inriktade på Backend utveckling. Vi söker en senior utvecklare/arkitekt med bred erfarenhet av mjukvarulösningar och med en förmåga att se helheten.


Även om vi söker en ledare vill vi ändå att du fortfarande har en vilja och ett driv att skriva, granska och felsöka kod.


I rollen har du också ett personalansvar för 6-10 konsulter. Där det primära målet är att jobba med ditt team och coacha dina medarbetare och främja en kultur av kontinuerligt lärande.


Rollen omfattar även affärsutveckling där du fungerar som en brygga mellan säljteam, kunder och leveransteam. Genom nära samarbete kommer du att bidra till att utveckla vårt erbjudande och bygga starka kundrelationer.


Att balansera konsultuppdrag, personalansvar och affärsutveckling kräver ett starkt självledarskap, vilket är avgörande för att lyckas i denna roll.


  
**Vi söker dig som**

* Har minst 5 års erfarenhet av backendutveckling och molnbaserade system.
* Tidigare erfarenhet av en ledarroll med personalansvar är meriterande.
* Trygg i att föra diskussioner med kunder både på svenska och engelska.
* Skicklig med att omsätta verksamhetskrav till design av säkra, skalbara samt kostnadseffektiva lösningar.
* Stark vilja att leverera utmärkt service, med fokus på kundernas behov och framgång.
* Har en genuin förståelse för det agila arbetssättet och en vilja och ett fokus att snabbt leverera värde.

  
- **Vad får du?**  

Vi erbjuder dig individuell och betald kompetensutveckling på arbetstid, flexibelt arbete och ett generöst förmånspaket. Du kommer att ingå i vårt team av ledare och kan påverka allt från vilket uppdrag som känns rätt för dig, forma våra erbjudanden och partnerskap, samt bidra till framtiden för Devoteam Creative Tech i Sverige.


**Varför tveka?**  

Skicka in din ansökan till oss så kontaktar vi dig så snart som möjligt. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!


**En rättvis chans!**  

Devoteam är öppet för ansökningar från alla delar av samhället. Vi tror att olikheter inom team hjälper oss att skapa bättre produkter. Vi välkomnar alla människor oavsett ålder, könsidentitet eller uttryck, erfarenhet och bakgrund. Om du kan se dig själv i denna roll och känner att denna tjänst kan tillföra värde både för dig och för Devoteam, uppmuntrar vi dig att skicka in din ansökan till oss - även om du inte nödvändigtvis uppfyller alla ovanstående krav.
company_description: Devoteam is a leading consulting firm focused on digital strategy, tech platforms, cybersecurity and business transformation.

title: Next Generation: Developer Mechanical Design
description:
We are strengthening our team within Mechanical Design and are looking for next generation creative engineers who will make sure we stay technology leaders in the telecom industry. As a Mechanical Design Engineer, you are a member of a mechanical design team and participate in the design of Ericsson future products, like 5G and 6G radios. We develop an increasing number of products where every generation delivers improved value to our customers, with high demands on quality and robustness in harsh outdoor environments. Our solutions must be cost efficient and deliver top performance with regards to technology density (small and lightweight), usability, quality and sustainability.

**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**


We are actively seeking the next wave of tech talent through our NextGen graduate initiative in Stockholm. This opportunity is for recent graduates with 0-3 years of experience who are eager to launch a meaningful career in technology. Although we have an exceptional team in place, we are always focused on building for the future. If you're ready to make an impact, this is your chance to join us.

 **What you will do:**


In your role you will participate in pre-development activities where we study overall and detailed aspects of technology to come and as well be a member of product development projects aiming towards a successful product to offer our customers. Some of your responsibilities will be performed individually, but most of them will be in cross-disciplinary teams both locally and globally. You typically interact with other technical disciplines such as Thermal, Interconnect, Printed Board Assembly, Industrial Design as well as mechanical suppliers/partners and Ericsson’s global production organization.

 **Responsibilities:**

* Mechanical design, using MCAD tool Creo, of 5G & 6G Telecom Equipment Enclosures (mainly Radio products) with typical components made by aluminum die casting, plastic injection molding and sheet metal
* Deliver designs that are top performing with regards to in-field robustness, cost efficiency, high technology density, electro-mechanical design, usability, modularity, quality and sustainability
* Pre-development work to secure technical leadership with a 2-5 year horizon

 **You will bring:**

* Creative mind, innovative and eager to learn
* Collaboration skills
* Good communication - fluent English
* MCAD tool experience, preferably Creo
* Genuine interest in product development and mechanical engineering, preferably with experience in die casting / injection molding design
* Experience within some of the area’s: structural mechanical simulations, generative AI designs, electro-mechanical design, thermal design, usability (user friendly / easy installation), design for manufacturing/assembly, sustainability in mechanical design
 **Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

title: Fullstack Developer - Node & React
description:
**Do you want to be a central part of product development for the biggest property platform in Sweden? Are you eager to join a self-propelled, cross-functional team that works data-driven with constant user feedback? Join us on our mission to help more people find a place to call home!**
**What’s in it for you?**
* 🧪 Innovative Approach: Work with an experimental and iterative approach. Dare to explore uncharted territories, try something new, and surprise us all!
* 🔄 End-to-End Development: Develop and maintain our products from idea to production.
* 🫂 Inclusive Culture: Enjoy a friendly, inclusive, and caring company culture where transparency, work-life balance, and well-being are high priorities. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees, regardless of gender, sexual orientation, ethnicity, or background.
* ⚗️ Lab Weeks: Participate in recurring lab weeks—time for our developers to experiment, hack around, and evaluate creative ideas. Unleash Your Inner Mad Scientist—innovation starts here!
* 🛠️ Autonomy: Be part of a team that controls its own product decisions.


**Required Technical Skills**
* Javascript​: Proficiency in ES5, ES6+, and asynchronous programming
* .Frameworks: Experience with NestJS, Typescript, React, and Next.js
* .Node.js: In-depth knowledge of its ecosystem and frameworks
* .APIs: Experience with RESTful APIs and GraphQL implementation
* .Database Management: Proficiency with relational databases like PostgreSQL
* .Cloud Services: Familiarity with AWS, Docker, CircleCI, and how to deploy and scale Node.js services in the cloud
* .Testing & Debugging: Skills in testing and debugging Node.js applications


**.We Also Believe That You Are Experienced I**
* nWeb Applications: Designing, developing, and maintaining complex web-based Node.js applications in production environments
* .Agile Methodologies: Familiarity with Agile methodologies and tools (Scrum, Kanban, JIRA or similar)
* .Team Collaboration: Experience working in team settings, especially in medium to large multicultural/global companies


**.We believe that this will ensure your success in this role**
* :Problem Solver: Excel at solving complex technical problems
* .Good Communicator: Have proficiency in written and verbal English
* .Leadership Skills: Have experience leading teams and mentoring junior developers
* .Ownership: Can take ownership of and drive initiatives from start to finish


**.What You Will D**
* oProduct Development: Engage in all areas of product development—ideation, innovation, new development, iteration, and maintenance
* .Team Collaboration: Implement solutions with your team, deploying to production multiple times a day. Pair and mob programming are key parts of our knowledge sharing
* .Node.js Journey: Play a central role in our Node.js journey. While we have some services already running in production, this is just the beginning


**.Your career at Hemne**
 tWith over 40 million visits each month, you’ll be part of Sweden’s most popular property platform – and one of the world’s most admired real estate platforms. But our size and reputation aren’t the only reasons why you and your 150+ colleagues enjoy working here
   

  

 .Since 1998, Hemnet has been an essential go-to place for millions of Swedes, guiding them through one of life’s biggest transitions: finding a new place to call home. We’re proud to make this life-changing, often stressful journey as seamless as possible
   

  

 .With access to vast amounts of data, you’ll have limitless opportunities to explore and create new features that enhance the experience for Sweden’s real estate agents, home buyers, and sellers
   

  

 .Our friendly Hemnet culture fosters a dynamic, playful environment where every voice is valued. Here, you’ll join a welcoming team that encourages you to thrive and grow, working alongside passionate colleagues from around the world
   

  

**.A Hybrid Way of Workin**
 gOur vibrant office in central Stockholm is the hub of our collaboration and culture, providing a lively space that fosters team spirit. We come together in the office three days a week, with two flexible remote days. To be part of our team, it’s essential to be based in or near Stockholm.

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
Who We Are
 



 OhCleo is a Swedish startup creating inclusive audio erotica, primarily for women. We’re transitioning from a creator-centric platform to a premium subscription model - delivering high-quality, original audio storytelling. Join us to help guide this exciting transformation!
 



 What You’ll Do
 


* Rebuild our platform from existing code, shaping it into a modern, scalable system.
* Collaborate with our UX expert, CTO and CEO to define product direction.
* Develop and maintain both frontend and backend (Next.js, React, Node.js, MySQL, Prisma).
* Integrate Stripe or similar for premium subscriptions.
* Possibly work with GraphQL (Apollo/Nexus) and audio processing/compression.



 What We’re Looking For
 


* 4+ years of full-stack development experience.
* Proficiency in Next.js, React, Node.js, MySQL, and Prisma.
* Familiarity with Stripe and GraphQL.
* Excellent communication in English (remote team).
* Ability to work independently and own your projects.



 Why Join Us?
 


* Autonomy & Ownership: Lead the rebuild without wrestling someone else’s code.
* High Impact: Shape our platform at a pivotal moment.
* Remote Flexibility: Work from anywhere (HQ in Stockholm).
* Meaningful Work: Redefine sustainable, inclusive erotic audio content.



 If you’re passionate about building from the ground up and want to make your mark, we’d love to hear from you! Send us your CV, GitHub link, or portfolio - and tell us why you’re the perfect fit.

title: Senior Software Engineer (.NET Core)
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 We are a forward-thinking team creating cutting-edge, cloud-based communication solutions. Our backend systems leverage the latest C# and .NET Core technologies, deployed in Kubernetes on AWS. We thrive on collaboration, innovation, and crafting scalable, reliable systems that power seamless communication worldwide.
   

  

 If you're a Senior Backend Engineer with a passion for problem-solving, clean code, and modern DevOps practices, we'd love to have you on our team.
   

  

**Role**
 As a Senior Backend Engineer, you'll take ownership of developing and maintaining high-performing backend systems while contributing to all stages of the software lifecycle. In this role, you will:
   

  

* Develop scalable and resilient distributed systems using C# and .NET Core.
* Work closely with engineers, DevOps specialists, and product managers in an agile, cross-functional team.
* Build and maintain applications running on Kubernetes, actively monitor production systems, and ensure reliability.
* Leverage AWS tools and services to deploy, optimize, and scale cloud-based systems.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code, with a focus on system performance and scalability.
* Enhance automation, streamline CI/CD pipelines, and troubleshoot issues proactively.
* Influence architectural decisions and actively contribute to enhancing our development and operational practices.


**Requirements**
* Major professional experience building and maintaining backend systems in production.
* Expertise in C#, .NET Core, and developing distributed systems.
* Solid understanding of DevOps principles and experience with CI/CD pipelines.
* Strong communication skills and a collaborative mindset.
* A passion for clean, testable code and modern software practices.


**Good to have**
* Service-oriented architecture and microservices.
* Relational and NoSQL databases (e.g., MySQL, MSSQL, Redis).
* Hands-on experience with Kubernetes and AWS.
* Incident response and on-call rotations.
* Proficiency in additional programming languages such as C++, Python, or Kotlin
* Experience with Asterisk and VoIP protocols, preferably SIP.


 Embrace the challenge and join us! You will have the chance to:
   

  

* Work with a talented and diverse team in a culture that values innovation and collaboration.
* Take on meaningful challenges and grow with the latest technologies.
* Enjoy flexibility with hybrid work options and a healthy work-life balance.
* Benefit from competitive salaries and a comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare insurance, pension contributions, and wellness allowance.


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: . No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Full Stack Developer
description:
**Outlier helps the world’s most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?**
**We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.**
**About The Opportunity**
* Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
* This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you


**You may contribute your expertise by…**
* Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
* Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models


**Examples Of Desirable Expertise**
* Currently enrolled in or completed a bachelor's degree or higher in computer science at a selective institution
* Proficiency working with one or more of the the following languages: Java, Python, JavaScript / TypeScript, C++, Swift, and Verilog
* Ability to articulate complex concepts fluently in Swedish
* Excellent attention to detail, including grammar, punctuation, and style guidelines


**Payment**
* Currently, pay rates for core project work by coding experts range from USD $25 to $50 per hour.
* Rates vary based on expertise, skills assessment, location, project need, and other factors. For example, higher rates may be offered to PhDs. For non-core work, such as during initial project onboarding or project overtime phases, lower rates may apply. Certain projects offer incentive payments. Please review the payment terms for each project.


*PLEASE NOTE: We collect, retain and use personal data for our professional business purposes, including notifying you of opportunities that may be of interest and sharing with our affiliates. We limit the personal data we collect to that which we believe is appropriate and necessary to manage applicants’ needs, provide our services, and comply with applicable laws. Any information we collect in connection with your application will be treated in accordance with the* 
*Outlier Privacy Policy* 
*and our internal policies and programs designed to protect personal data.*
*This is a 1099 contract opportunity on the* 
*Outlier.ai* 
*platform. Because this is a freelance opportunity, we do not offer internships, sponsorship, or employment. You must be authorized to work in your country of residence. If you are an international student, you may be able to sign up for Outlier if you are on a visa. You should contact your tax and/or immigration advisor with specific questions regarding your circumstances.*

title: Fullstack Developer
description:
**Välkommen till Benchmarking Alliance!**
 Benchmarking Alliance är ett SaaS-bolag grundat 2010 och vi är idag en stolt del av
 **Nordtech Group** 
 . Vår SaaS-tjänst för Hospitality-sektorn ökar våra kunders intäkter genom benchmarking. Våra kunder är i huvudsak hotell och konferensanläggningar i framförallt Norden och Baltikum men även Spanien och Mexiko.
   

  

 Vi är ett litet men dedikerat kärnteam och med denna nya roll blir vi sex personer - du, CTO, Business Development Manager, New Business Manager, Customer Succes Manager och CEO. Vi är en väletablerad verksamhet med stor kundbas och vårt kontor ligger mitt i Stockholm city på
 **Epicenter** 
 .
   

  

 Läs gärna mer om oss på vår
 **hemsida** 
 !
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Under det senaste året har vi gått från att använda frilansande konsulter till att själva driva vår produktutveckling. Vi har börjat bygga upp vår interna utvecklingskapacitet och satsar på att öka vår tillväxt. För att möjliggöra detta utökar vi tech-teamet så att vi kan samarbeta och utmana varandra, dela det strategiska och operativa helhetsansvaret för utveckling, drift och support samt säkerställa att nya projekt kan drivas parallellt som vi löser ad-hoc-uppgifter och felsökning av tekniska integrationer med våra kunder som kan uppstå.
   

  

 Vi utvecklar, underhåller och moderniserar ett affärskritiskt system med stark Product Market Fit. Som Fullstack Developer hos oss får du en bred och varierad nyckelroll i teamet samt stor påverkan på teknikval och utvecklingsprocess.
   

  

**Din vardag!**
 Hos Oss Är Dagarna Varierande Och Du Kommer Att Arbeta Både Med Kod Och Strategiska Beslut Vilket Mer Konkret Innebär
   

  

* Aktiv utveckling av vår produkt - Du har ett starkt intresse för teknik och ser fram emot att bidra stort i utvecklingen och driften av vår tjänst. Vår plattform har levererat affärsvärde under lång tid, och vi ser stora möjligheter att vidareutveckla och modernisera.
* Teknik- och produktstrategi - Vi är ett litet och flexibelt team med korta beslutsvägar och kan snabbt gå från idé till implementering. AI och datadrivna insikter är exempel på områden vi ser stor potential i framöver.
* Bidrag till affären - Du har förmågan att översätta kundbehov till tekniska lösningar och ser teknik och affär som två sidor av samma mynt.


 Vår teknikstack inkluderar Python, Django, PostgreSQL, Docker, Ansible och AWS. Vi hanterar en befintlig kodbas i Python 2, vilket innebär både underhåll och en långsiktig ambition att modernisera systemet.
   

  

**Din bakgrund**
 Du har sannolikt några års erfarenhet av systemutveckling, gärna från SaaS-bolag eller som konsult. Du trivs i en ansvarsfull roll som både är strategisk och operativ och kan utan problem sätta dig in i en kodbas baserad på Django och Python samt vidareutveckla den på egen hand. Du trivs med, och kan visa exempel på, hur du tidigare tagit stort eget ansvar samt motiveras av att driva utvecklingen framåt.
   

  

 Eftersom vi arbetar nära tillsammans i ett mindre team där svenska är arbetsspråk vill vi att du kan kommunicera obehindrat på svenska. Erfarenhet av AWS, Docker, Ansible och AI i Python är också meriterande.
   

  

**Din personlighet**
 Vi tror att du är en engagerad och analytisk person som hela tiden strävar framåt och som nu är redo att kliva in i ett nytt kapitel med oss.
   

  

 Även om du, tillsammans med vår CTO (som också arbetar operativt med utvecklingen), är våra tekniska experter, trivs du med att arbeta tätt tillsammans med ett litet team med andra kompetenser. De allra flesta dagarna arbetar vi tillsammans på vårt kontor i centrala Stockholm, vilket gör att vi kan samarbeta effektivt och driva utvecklingen framåt. Därför tror vi att du är en smidig samarbetspartner samt har en stark kommunikativ förmåga.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder**
* Det bästa av två världar: Upplev dynamiken, snabbheten och glädjen av en startup, men med stabiliteten som en etablerad kundbas och ägare ger.
* Påverkansmöjlighet: Detta är en nyckelroll - du kommer att ha stor inverkan på våra tekniska beslut och lösningar.
* Spännande inblick i besöksnäringens inre: Vi följer branschens utveckling på ett unikt sätt och skapar direkt affärsnytta för våra kunder.
* Härligt team och inkluderande kultur: Vi har en öppen och transparent företagskultur och du kommer att bli en del av ett engagerat team som värdesätter långsiktighet och kontinuitet i arbetet.
* Frihet: Hos oss får du stor frihet att forma din roll och bidra med din expertis.
* Marknadsmässig lön och förmåner


 Vill du vara med på vår resa?
   

  

 Vi tillämpar löpande urval – skicka in din ansökan redan idag!
   

  

 I denna rekryteringsprocess använder vi psykometriska tester från
 **Alva Labs** 
 för att säkerställa en rättvis och objektiv bedömning av alla kandidater.

title: Web Engineer - Backstage
description:
We are looking for a mid-level Web Engineer to join the Backstage team, passionate about crafting the best developer experience for millions of developers in the software industry.
   

  

 Leveraging our thriving open-source developer experience platform, Backstage, our teams are delivering high-impact external commercial products that truly up-level the industry standard of developer experience. Whether it’s a seasoned tech company that wants to build an internal developer portal using Backstage, or smaller companies that just want to quickly and easily increase developer satisfaction, or anything in between - our teams are shipping solutions that meet platform engineering needs all across the industry. By joining us, you will help play an instrumental role in improving the experience of developers at our customer companies, in our fast-growing open-source community, and at Spotify internally. If you want to make a direct impact in helping Spotify become the industry leader in developer experience, this is the role for you.
   

  

 What You'll Do
   

  

* Become a valued member of an autonomous, multi-functional team. Use your experience of the frontend to design intelligent solutions that include front-end and back-end systems.
* Develop and maintain features with TypeScript, React and NodeJS.
* Take operational responsibility for the services that are owned by your team, potentially including taking part in an on-call rotation.
* Collaborate closely with not only product and design partners, but also marketing, business development, customer success, and sales.
* Promote sound engineering practices, drive work on technical strategy and roadmaps.
* Deliver high-impact and high-visibility projects with the fast-paced style of a startup, supported by the resources of a global company.


 Who You Are
   

  

* You are experienced with modern React/JavaScript/CSS/HTML coding, testing, debugging and automation techniques.
* You care about the user experience and are passionate about building user-friendly web applications.
* You are not afraid of digging into backend technologies, such as NodeJS and Java.
* You know and care about sound engineering practices, like continuous delivery and automated testing.
* You have impact through your communication skills and love sharing your knowledge with others, helping them grow.
* Bonus points if you have a history of contribution or other direct engagement with open-source projects.


 Where You'll Be
   

  

* This role is based in Stockholm (Sweden) or London (UK)
* We offer you the flexibility to work where you work best! There will be some in person meetings, but still allows for flexibility to work from home.


 Today, we are the world’s most popular audio streaming subscription service.

title: Senior backend developer
description:
Sleip provides the world’s most advanced computer vision software for biomechanical motion quantification and measurements, specializing in Equine Gait Analysis.
 



  





 Our scientifically validated AI model processes video recordings to extract detailed movement patterns, which greatly helps to identify, assess, diagnose and monitor lameness in horses. Our primary customers are equine veterinary practices across the world who are rapidly adopting the Sleip technology and product.
 



  





**The role** 




 We are looking for a full time Senior Backend Developer to join our team. The role is based on site at the HQ in Stockholm. As a Senior Backend Developer at Sleip, you'll be involved in shaping the architecture of our backend services while also getting hands-on with cutting-edge cloud technologies like Kubernetes, GPUs, and Cloud Run.
 



  





 This role offers a unique mix of building customer-facing features and architecting scalable systems from the ground up. You’ll work on reducing cloud costs, optimizing performance, and delivering impactful features—all while collaborating closely with the product team to drive innovation.
 



  





 This role is ideal for you if you thrive at the intersection of backend development and cloud infrastructure or if you're eager to grow your skills in both domains.
 



  





**Key Responsibilities** 



* Architect and evolve our backend services, ensuring they scale efficiently while maintaining performance.
* Collaborate with product teams to build and deploy customer-facing features.
* Leverage cloud infrastructure (GCP, Kubernetes, GPUs, Cloud Run) to implement robust solutions.
* Continuously optimize systems for cost-efficiency and performance.
* Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines to ensure seamless deployments.



  





**Who you are** 



* Pragmatic, preferring to enhance systems step by step, but you’re open to a bigger overhaul when it’s the right call.
* Comfortable working autonomously, taking ownership of complex projects from start to finish, and driving them forward while balancing both technical and product needs.
* Adaptable and collaborative, you thrive in a small team environment, effectively communicating ideas and gathering requirements in a not always formal setting.
* Fluent in English, both spoken and written, ensuring clear communication with the team and stakeholders.
* Resilient and proactive – able to maintain a clear direction and keep projects on track, even when facing unexpected challenges.



  





**What you’ll bring** 



* Deep experience with Node.js and TypeScript, with a focus on building scalable backend APIs.
* Strong knowledge of Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services, particularly Firebase, Firestore, GKE, Cloud Run, and PubSub.
* Hands-on experience with Terraform for infrastructure as code and cloud automation.



  





**Nice-to-haves**

title: Software Developer
description:
**Outlier helps the world’s most innovative companies improve their AI models by providing human feedback. Are you an experienced software engineer who would like to lend your coding expertise to train AI models?**
**We partner with organizations to train AI large language models, helping cutting-edge generative AI models write better code. Projects typically include discrete, highly variable problems that involve engaging with these models as they learn to code. There is no requirement for previous AI experience.**
**About The Opportunity**
* Outlier is looking for talented coders to help train generative artificial intelligence models
* This freelance opportunity is remote and hours are flexible, so you can work whenever is best for you


**You may contribute your expertise by…**
* Crafting and answering questions related to computer science in order to help train AI models
* Evaluating and ranking code generated by AI models


**Examples Of Desirable Expertise**
* Currently enrolled in or completed a bachelor's degree or higher in computer science at a selective institution
* Proficiency working with one or more of the the following languages: Java, Python, JavaScript / TypeScript, C++, Swift, and Verilog
* Ability to articulate complex concepts fluently in Swedish
* Excellent attention to detail, including grammar, punctuation, and style guidelines


**Payment**
* Currently, pay rates for core project work by coding experts range from USD $25 to $50 per hour.
* Rates vary based on expertise, skills assessment, location, project need, and other factors. For example, higher rates may be offered to PhDs. For non-core work, such as during initial project onboarding or project overtime phases, lower rates may apply. Certain projects offer incentive payments. Please review the payment terms for each project.


*PLEASE NOTE: We collect, retain and use personal data for our professional business purposes, including notifying you of opportunities that may be of interest and sharing with our affiliates. We limit the personal data we collect to that which we believe is appropriate and necessary to manage applicants’ needs, provide our services, and comply with applicable laws. Any information we collect in connection with your application will be treated in accordance with the* 
*Outlier Privacy Policy* 
*and our internal policies and programs designed to protect personal data.*
*This is a 1099 contract opportunity on the* 
*Outlier.ai* 
*platform. Because this is a freelance opportunity, we do not offer internships, sponsorship, or employment. You must be authorized to work in your country of residence. If you are an international student, you may be able to sign up for Outlier if you are on a visa. You should contact your tax and/or immigration advisor with specific questions regarding your circumstances.*

description:

title: System Developer
description:
We are looking for the following skills and abilities for these teams.
 





  
 



* Front-end development in React with the ability to take overall responsibility for quality, testing and function and future management.



  




* Our teams are cross-functional, work agile according to scrum, so these developers are also required to act as scrum masters and facilitate the agile ceremonies.



  




* We build on Azure as a platform with technologies such as Java Spring Boot for microservices and React as a front-end framework. Experience with micro frontends and PWA technologies is an asset.



  




* It is important that you are senior and can take responsibility for your own work. These individuals need to be able to make decisions and dare to test their own limits while at the same time having an open and non-pretentious approach to their colleagues. We work closely with the business, which requires social skills and a positive attitude.



  




* We are looking for someone who wants to contribute with perspectives and experiences in technology/development as well as method/collaboration. The role includes both new development and, in the future, management. Interest/passion for test-driven development and "clean code".



  






 Skills and Competencies - FE Developer
 





 • At least 3 years of experience in system development
 





 • Worked with test-driven development,
 





 • Good knowledge of React, HTML5 and CSS
 





 • Experience with Azure DevOps,
 





 • Agile methods
 





 • Scrum Master skills to lead agile ceremonies
 





  
 





 Meritorious
 





 • Jmeter
 





 • API testing
 





 • Selenium tests
 





 • test automation tools (general)
 





 • React library testing
 





 • Agile methods and short-iteration testing
 





 • Performance testing
 





 • Jira and Confluence
 





 • Accessibility according to WCAG 2.1
 





 • Experience in using component libraries and reusing components.
 





 • DevOps and CI/CD
 





  
 





 The position is located at our HQ on Vasagatan in Stockholm City, the work can be partially done remotely, but there are requirements that you can be present in the office for parts of the week.
 





  
 





 Languages
 





 Fluent Swedish in speech and writing
 





 Very good knowledge of English in speech and writing

title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description:
We are now looking for a senior full-stack developer with a focus on Android for one of our 5 product teams at IT Traffic and Service.
 





 Our product teams develop and manage our own systems within planning and traffic management.
 





 The systems are critical to our core business and the development therefore takes place in close collaboration with the end users.
 





 We are currently in an exciting phase where we are migrating and rebuilding our entire backend to a microservices architecture.
 





 The applications are operated by the teams on our cloud solution in Azure.
 





 With us, you get to build applications that are really important and that must work 24/7.
 





 Together with the team, you will help influence what digital services will look like in the future.
 





 We are looking for employees in Stockholm, but we also work partially distributed with the possibility of remote work.
 





  
 




**About you** 





 You are communicative and a team player. We work close to the business, which requires social skills and a positive attitude.
 





 You like problem solving and are happy to contribute your knowledge to others. You are curious about new technology and stay up to date in your field.
 





 As a person, you like to learn new things and have a constant strive to become really good at your profession.
 





 You also have a strong feeling for helping others both in and outside the team when needed.
 





 You have problem solving skills and like to hack code but take responsibility and deliver sustainable code together with your colleagues.
 





 You see the benefit in understanding user behavior to drive effective development that really solves problems.
 





  
 




**Skills and Competencies** 





 • Several years of experience in Android development
 





 • Several years of experience in programming in Java and Kotlin
 





 • Experience in migrating, refactoring and maintaining legacy code
 





 • Experience in designing REST APIs
 





 • Experience in writing tests and testable code
 









**Meritorious** 





 • Experience in working with a cloud platform, preferably Azure, but also AWS, Google Cloud, etc. is a merit
 





 • Experience in setting up your own CI/CD chains for an application in Microsoft DevOps or equivalent
 





 • Jira/Confluence/DevOps (Git, Pipelines)
 





 • Experience in Pair and Mob Programming
 





  
 




**Languages** 





 Good knowledge of Swedish and English, both spoken and written.

title: Senior Software Developer
description:
🚀
 **Join** 
 Tacton as a Senior Software Developer!
   

  

 As a Senior Software Developer at Tacton, you’ll contribute to building innovative and robust software solutions that power our renowned Configure, Price, and Quote (CPQ) product. In this role, you’ll leverage your technical expertise to create solutions that meet the needs of global manufacturers. With many exciting changes ahead, Tacton offers the opportunity to take on new challenges, grow your skills, and make a real impact.
   

  

 🌟
 **What you´ll do**
* Develop and Deliver: Design and implement scalable, robust applications using primarily Java and JavaScript
* Collaborate Across Teams: Work closely with Product Managers, Architects, and cross-functional teams to align technical solutions with business goals.
* Maintain and Enhance: Continuously refine existing systems, addressing technical debt, and adding new features that matter.
* Document and Communicate: Clearly describe and document software solutions for team members and stakeholders.
* Foster Positive Energy: Actively promote a supportive and collaborative team environment, contributing to a culture of optimism and innovation.


 💡
 **What We’re Looking For**
 You’re a Dedicated Software Professional Who Loves Solving Problems And Driving Projects Forward. Here’s What We Think You’ll Bring To The Table
   

  

* 5+ years of experience in software development, with a strong background in building and maintaining high-quality software products.
* Expertise in Java development with the ability to create scalable backend solutions
* Comfortable working across the stack
* Strong problem-solving skills with a knack for turning business requirements into technical solutions.
* Fluent in English, both written and spoken.


**Bonus Points If You Have**
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices
* Typescrip
* Experience with cloud technologies such as Kubernetes, Docker and AWS
* Experience in SaaS product development
* Experience with test automation


**The Recruitment Process Consists Of**
* Screening call with Talent Acquisition
* First interview with our hiring manager
* Technical interview
* Interview with our CPO
* Reference check


**What We Offer**
* A solid and stable company with over 20 years of industry experience.
* Flexible hybrid setup
* A globally recognized leader in CPQ.
* Opportunities to work with great technologies in a collaborative environment.
* Comprehensive benefits.
* Opportunities to take on additional responsibilities and contribute in new ways during a period of transformation
* You will work with highly skilled senior developers, fostering a collaborative environment for learning and growth.


**Our Culture and Why You Belong**
 Collaborative, Engaged, Trustworthy, Customer-Oriented, Visionary—if these values resonate with you, we’d love to hear from you!
   

  

 At Tacton, we celebrate diversity and strive to create an inclusive environment where everyone feels welcome. Our team consists of people from all over the world, and we believe this diversity makes us stronger.
   

  

 As an Equal Opportunity Employer, we’re committed to fostering an environment where everyone can thrive. With our comprehensive onboarding program, you’ll be set up for success from day one.
   

  

 We look forward to your application—apply soon as we review candidates on a rolling basis.
   

  

**About Tacton**
*Tacton is a leading Software as a Service company trusted by global manufacturers. We got started in the late 1990’s when six computer scientists figured out a revolutionary way to help Manufacturers overcome their most business-critical, product configuration challenges. Since those early days, we have grown to support global manufacturers seeking to thrive in a changing world.*
*We invite you to find out more about us @* 
*www.tacton.com/about*
 Tacton is a leading SaaS company within CPQ and Design Automation making sales simple for complex products.

title: Tech Lead Manager
description:
**About Sinch**
 Sinch is pioneering the way the world communicates. More than 150,000 businesses — including Google, Uber, Paypal, Visa, Tinder, and many others — rely on Sinch's Customer Communications Cloud to power engaging customer experiences through mobile messaging, voice, and email.
   

  

 Whether you need to verify users or craft omnichannel campaigns, Sinch makes it easy. Our AI-infused Super Network, APIs, and applications ensure you can connect with your customers reliably and securely, at every step of their journey.
   

  

 At Sinch we "Dream Big", "Win Together", "Keep it simple", and "Make it Happen". These values are our foundation!
   

  

**Description**
 You will act as both Tech Lead and Manager, in a perfect mix of leading people (Team of Developers) and developing code. Our aim is to consolidate the team of developers that you will lead in Stockholm. You will collaborate with your Product Partner, regarding planning and building the right products at the right time. You will be responsible for defining clear goals for your team and lead them in delivering on those goals.
   

  

 Apart from this, you are also responsible for setting salaries, helping individuals on your team grow and developing, as well as contributing technically to the team.
   

  

 As Tech Lead Manager you have a holistic perspective and the ability to inspire and lead others. You love working with tech and have experience working as a developer, working with code reviews, testing and quality assurance. You have at least one area where your team can rely on you making strong technical contributions.
   

  

* Communicate and collaborate with stakeholders
* Define quarterly goals and do weekly follow-ups
* Support and make sure the team members are the best they can be
* Develop and coach your team members individually
* Facilitate daily stand-ups and advise on agile WoW
* Contribute technically (wherever your strong area is) to the team


**Requirements**
* MSc/BS in computer science or similar degree
* Experience working as a Manager for a Tech Team
* Working in different contexts and organisations
* Interest in leadership and developing teams
* Proficient in English, both verbal and written
* Business minded and able to see the big picture
* A natural leader who is caring and inspiring
* Able to communicate clearly, both with your team and stakeholders
* Well organized and goal oriented


**Our Hiring Process**
 We are committed to ensuring a recruitment process that is fair, objective, consistent, and inclusive. Our approach includes structured, competency-based interviews designed to evaluate your skills, experience, and qualifications relevant to the role. At times, we may include a data-driven assessment to enhance our hiring success and identify candidates likely to excel.
   

  

 We believe in a two-way process and encourage you to ask questions throughout the journey. If this role isn't what you're looking for, please explore the other opportunities listed on our career page: https://www.sinch.com/careers/. No matter who you are, we hope you find an exciting path forward - hopefully with us!

title: Senior Backend Developer (.NET)
company_industry: Financial Services and Technology, Information and Media
description:
MAJORITY is a groundbreaking all-in-one digital financial service app that includes an FDIC-insured account, Visa® Prepaid card, money remittance, and international calling. We are built for migrants, by migrants.
 



 Global migration is a 21st-century reality. Whether people are following their dreams, love or new experiences, more and more of us are leaning towards new environments. Our purpose at MAJORITY is to empower the amazing, the brave, and the talented and help them achieve all of their ambitions.
 



 We believe that everyone deserves the same opportunity to succeed. Our mission is to provide migrants the tools to thrive in their new country.
 



 We are a diverse group of people from over 40 different countries that come together every day and we’re looking for others driven by the same desire to create meaningful products that bridge cultural and geographic distances.
 



 MAJORITY is looking for a Senior Backend Engineer (.NET) to join its Engineering team. This is a full time, in-person position based in Stockholm, Sweden.
 



**About MAJORITY Backend** 




 We’re a diverse bunch of skilled software developers with a passion for technical excellence. We strive to create innovative solutions to the many varied business problems that we are presented with. We work hard, deliver fast, are continually learning and have fun along the way. With a team of 12 backend developers we have built a system of nearly 60 microservices with a million lines of C# code. Our business is growing fast and therefore so is our need to continually scale the system to meet the growing number or users and transactions.
 


* We have a modern technical platform. Recently upgraded to .Net8.
* We have a microservice architecture, fully in C#. built on a solid foundation of base functionality like observability, DI, messaging etc.
* We have a high pace of development, shipping major new features frequently.
* We have leadership who understands and prioritizes technical work.
* We work in a domain (fintech) where correctness matters. We have very high uptime and correctness requirements. No payments should fail, and no cent can be lost!



**Key Responsibilities** 



* Design, develop and maintain microservices built with .NET Core
* Write clean code with proper test coverage to support CI/CD workflows
* Contribute in design and architecture decisions within the team and across the organization
* Develop scalable, performant, and reliable systems
* Participate as a team member in agile deliveries
* Identify bugs and bottlenecks and resolve issues efficiently



**Requirements** 



* You have 10+ years of experience working with modern backend development practices, with focus on .NET Frameworks and C#.
* You have good experience in cloud environments
* You have good experience working with SQL databases
* You are familiar with working with microservices & event driven architecture
* You have an understanding and interest in building and maintaining microservices running in Kubernetes
* You have experience with build tools and services such as AzureDevops



**About you** 



* You're smart and you get stuff done
* You are ambitious, have a positive energy and always find a solution
* You can prioritize speed without neglecting quality and understand that speed is a competitive advantage
* You have a strong sense of ownership and accountability
* You are eager to learn from others and share what you know
* You dare to make decisions and learn from your mistakes
* You can reason through the trade-offs to make correct decisions for the benefit of the organization
* You have great communication skills in English



 Looking to be challenged? To work in an environment where your opinions are welcome and you’re constantly learning? To have a real impact on a meaningful project? To work with the latest technologies and to help shape the technology direction of the organization? Then we’d love to hear from you.
 



 We are MAJORITY. We are international, ambitious, kind, and inclusive. We believe in equal opportunity and value diversity. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

title: Software Engineer
company_industry: Information Technology & Services and Software Development
description:
*Vill du vara med och forma framtidens lösningar för optimerad logistik? Geposit söker nu en Utvecklare som brinner för att bygga skalbara lösningar och vill vara en del av ett snabbväxande SaaS-företag. Låter det intressant? Läs vidare!* 




  





 Geposit är ett Stockholmsbaserat SaaS-företag som erbjuder ledande tjänster inom geodata. Vi hjälper bolag att förstå och driva sina affärer utifrån ett geografiskt perspektiv med hjälp olika tjänster, däribland API för adressvalidering, digital karttjänst för geografisk zonindelning och tjänster för geotargeting av online-annonser. Våra kunder finns i många branscher men vi vänder oss särskilt till företag med resurser ute på fältet, t.ex. transport och serviceföretag.
 



  





 Nu gör vi satsningar för att utveckla och växa vårt erbjudande med marknadsledande tjänster för optimering av leveranser. Det är ett komplext men spännande område och därför söker vi en ny kollega till vårt härliga och drivna utvecklingsteam!
 



  





**Om rollen** 




  





 I rollen som Software Engineers hos Geposit kommer du ha stort fokus på backend-utveckling (Golang / Go). Vår ideala kollega tar stort ägandeskap och har förmåga att arbeta självständigt. Även om huvudfokus läggs på backend, krävs viss flexibilitet för att också bidra i frontend-utveckling (React.js) när det behövs.
 



  





 Dina arbetsuppgifter kommer bland annat bestå av:
 



  




* API Development: Designa, utveckla och underhålla robusta API:er
* Backend Engineering: Arbeta i Golang för att bygga skalbara backend-lösningar
* Database Management: Arbeta med SQL-databaser för att säkerställa effektiv datahantering
* Cloud Integration: Deploy:a och hantera applikationer på molnplattformar
* Frontend Collaboration: Vid behov stötta i frontend-utveckling (React.js)
* Project Ownership: Ta ansvar för delprojekt från idé till release



  





**Om dig** 




  





 Vi söker dig som har minst 2 års arbetslivserfarenhet inom utveckling. Därutöver ser vi gärna att du har:
 



  




* Erfarenhet av API-utveckling
* Gedigna färdigheter i Golang
* Goda färdigheter i molntjänster (t.ex. AWS, Azure eller GCP)
* Kunskaper och erfarenhet av SQL-databaser
* Viss kunskap inom frontend-utveckling i React.js



  





 Vi söker dig som kan kommunicera obehindrat på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.
 



 Det är meriterande om du har:
 



  




* Kunskap inom Java och C++
* Erfarenhet av algoritmisk problemlösning och ruttoptimering
* Språkkunskaper i danska
